short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alethia Fraud and Scam Advisor! Get Real-time Information for Websites to Protect Yourself from Fraudulent Websites and Scams.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Apate browser extension provides users with valuable information to make informed decisions about the dangers of websites they visit. With real-time data and careful analysis, Apate fraud and scam advisor analyzes myriad of factors in websites to assess their credibility and provides users with warnings or ratings based on the likelihood of fraud, helping you become more aware of the risks you are exposing yourself while visiting websites.

Key Features:
   Real-time credibility information: Our extension constantly updates its database to provide users with the latest information on website credibility.
   Warning system: Our extension alerts users with warnings when they visit websites with a high likelihood of fraud, helping them avoid potential scams.
   User-friendly interface: Our extension is designed with a user-friendly interface, making it easy for users to understand the credibility of websites at a glance.
   Improvement through feedback: We value user feedback! Contact us on social media if you have questions, suggestions for websites to be added to our database, or if you don't agree with the evaluation. Together we can create a safer online experience.

   Stay protected while browsing the web with our free fraud and scam advisor! Install our browser extension now and learn more about the risk of getting defrauded and safeguard yourself against fraudulent websites and scams.
